title: Item Restriction Broken
body:
I had 1 bad game, my first ever, where some toxic troll was being a jerk, but he had friends and I got reported multiple times.
10 game chat restriction, still on going is my 20+ game Item Restriction.... 

When are you going to fix this? Seems like this is something meant for recurring toxic people not for 1 game snaps that never happened before or after...

replies.body:
You were not punished for a single game, in fact you were given 3 games of evidence in your in-client reform card.

> some toxic troll was being a jerk, but he had friends and I got reported multiple times.
10 game chat restriction, still on goin

Multiple reports do not increase the chance of a game being reviewed. You also cannot be punished for someone else's behavior.

> When are you going to fix this? 

The 10-game chat restriction was your penalty. Because you were penalized, you also lost the benefit of Hextech items. The loss of hextech crafting is not linked to the 10-game restriction. You must show a sufficient amount of good behavior before you are again eligible. This is not broken, and is working as intended.

I'm still waiting for the other 2 games that I was never showed...
I think it's BS because like I said, this isn't normal.
Do you want me to post all 3 games here? I can if you'd like. Could you also post a screenshot of the in-client reform card you are getting? There should be 3 games.

I finished the 10 games weeks ago, I can't SS it anymore. I know you can't take my word for it but I swear it said 1.
I believe it cause this isn't normal behavior. I have a ticket open on this, can you post the 3 games there so I can verify?

> I believe it cause this isn't normal behavior. I have a ticket open on this, can you post the 3 games there so I can verify?

I don't have access to support tickets, but I can post them here for you if you'd like.

> I have a ticket open on this, can you post the 3 games there so I can verify?

Hey Tantrum, I believe he requested the chat logs be posted in the support ticket, not here on the boards. 

Cheers bro.

This is not true, when I had to click on "I understand" it showed 1 game and 1 game only.
I scrolled up and down on that window... 1 game.
Can you send me a link to the 3 games please.
You guys break your neck to come on here and bust people out for being toxic, yet when someone has a legitimate gripe...crickets.
1 game snaps don't exist. The systems code has a minimum number of games you need you be flagged in. Also your post isn't really helping your case.
